LanguageData.Mech_Cyclops.label: cyclops
LanguageData.Mech_Cyclops.description: A front-line combat mechanoid named for its large optical array. The cyclops specializes in counter-shield attacks. It takes a long time to lock onto a target, but once locked on, it fires a near endless barrage of shield-piercing beams.
LanguageData.Mech_Cyclops.tools.front_left_leg.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Mech_Cyclops.tools.front_right_leg.label: front right leg
leg
LanguageData.Mech_Cyclops.tools.head.label: head
